Job Position: Event Center Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Event Center Manager is responsible for overseeing the daily operations of the event center, managing bookings, coordinating events, and ensuring exceptional client experiences.
	This role requires strong organizational skills, excellent customer service, and the ability to manage multiple events simultaneously while maintaining high standards of service delivery.


Key&nbsp;Responsibilities


	Oversee all events held at the center from booking to completion, ensuring everything runs smoothly and clients are satisfied.
	Meet with potential clients to discuss their event needs, provide quotes, and close booking deals.
	Coordinate with vendors such as caterers, decorators, sound engineers, and other service providers to deliver quality events.
	Manage and supervise event staff including ushers, security, cleaners, and technical personnel during events.
	Handle client complaints and resolve issues quickly to maintain the center&#39;s good reputation.
	Prepare weekly and monthly reports on bookings, revenue, expenses, and center performance for management review.
	Market the event center through social media, referrals, and networking to attract more clients and increase bookings.
	Ensure the center is well-maintained, clean, and all equipment is in good working condition before and after each event.


Qualifications &amp; Requirements

	Professional certification in Event Planning is an advantage
	Proven track record of managing successful events
	Experience in a supervisory or managerial role

	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Strong organizational and multitasking abilities
	Customer service oriented with problem-solving skills

	Ability to remain calm under pressure
	Attention to detail
	Creative and innovative thinking
	Strong leadership and team management skills
	Excellent negotiation skills.


Method of Application&nbsp;

Prohuman Capital Consulting is a dynamic HR consulting firm dedicated to empowering organizations with comprehensive human resources expertise and strategic guidance. Founded on the principle that exceptional talent management drives business success, we partner with companies to navigate their most complex HR challenges and unlock their human capital potential. Our reach extends to companies in and around West Africa, where we do business with diverse organizations seeking strategic HR solutions. At Prohuman Capital Consulting, we believe that every organization is unique. Our consultative approach begins with understanding your specific business context, industry dynamics, and organizational culture. We then develop customized solutions that are practical, implementable, and measurable.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Event Center Manager

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Event Center Manager is responsible for overseeing the daily operations of the event center, managing bookings, coordinating events, and ensuring exceptional client experiences.
	This role requires strong organizational skills, excellent customer service, and the ability to manage multiple events simultaneously while maintaining high standards of service delivery.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee all events held at the center from booking to completion, ensuring everything runs smoothly and clients are satisfied.
	Meet with potential clients to discuss their event needs, provide quotes, and close booking deals.
	Coordinate with vendors such as caterers, decorators, sound engineers, and other service providers to deliver quality events.
	Manage and supervise event staff including ushers, security, cleaners, and technical personnel during events.
	Handle client complaints and resolve issues quickly to maintain the center's good reputation.
	Prepare weekly and monthly reports on bookings, revenue, expenses, and center performance for management review.
	Market the event center through social media, referrals, and networking to attract more clients and increase bookings.
	Ensure the center is well-maintained, clean, and all equipment is in good working condition before and after each event.


Qualifications & Requirements


	Bachelor's degree in Hospitality Management, Business Administration, Event Management, or related field
	Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in event management or hospitality industry
	Professional certification in Event Planning is an advantage
	Proven track record of managing successful events
	Experience in a supervisory or managerial role


Skills & Competencies:


	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Strong organizational and multitasking abilities
	Customer service oriented with problem-solving skills
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
	Knowledge of event management software
	Budget management and financial reporting skills
	Marketing and social media management skills
	Ability to work flexible hours including evenings and weekends


Personal Attributes:


	Professional appearance and demeanor
	Ability to remain calm under pressure
	Attention to detail
	Creative and innovative thinking
	Strong leadership and team management skills
	Excellent negotiation skills.


Method of Application

Procurement Officer Job at Odixcity Consulting




        
    

        
        Odixcity Consulting is an International Hr consulting and procurement firm. With expertise in Recruitment & Selection, Performance management, Training & Development, Compensation and benefits as well as Outsourcing of goods and services for organizations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Officer 

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Industry: Oil and Gas

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a detail- oriented and organized procurement officer to manage procurement activities, maintain equipment, and ensure smooth operations.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for sourcing, contracting, purchasing and inventory management, and as well ensure compliance with regulations.


Responsibilities


	Develop and implement procurement strategies and plans.
	Manage tendering and bidding processes.
	Negotiate contracts and agreements with suppliers.
	Manage procurement budget and ensure cost savings.
	Procure goods and services.
	Maintain records and reports.


Qualifications


	HND / Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Supply Chain, or a related field.
	2+ years of experience.
	Strong analytical and negotiation skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office
	Good communication skills.
	Experience with procurement software and systems (e.g SAP, Oracle)


Skills:


	Procurement and supply chain management, inventory, budgeting, Negotiation, Problem solving, Time management.


Salary
N180,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: peace.odixcityconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of their email.
